device.Description: A space-saving all-in-one desktop with a 27-inch touchscreen, perfect for family use and home office.
device.YesProcessor: AMD Ryzen 7 delivers excellent everyday performance

test_scenarios: Can I add an external GPU?
Is this good for a home office?
Can multiple family members use this?
Is this good for video calls?

expected_responses.gpu_upgrade: No - All-in-Ones typically don't support GPU upgrades, no Thunderbolt for eGPU
expected_responses.home_office: Excellent - large 27-inch display, 1TB storage, good for productivity and video calls
expected_responses.family: Great for families - big screen, touchscreen, multiple USB ports for peripherals
expected_responses.best_for: Home office, family computing, entertainment, light creative work
